--- create_index_interleave.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  foo desc
) storing (bar),
  interleave in foobar

--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Create:       0,
  Rparen:       41,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  IfNotExists:  false,
  Name:         &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 13,
      NameEnd: 20,
      Name:    "foo_bar",
    },
  },
  TableName: &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 24,
      NameEnd: 27,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 36,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
  },
  Storing: &ast.Storing{
    Storing: 43,
    Rparen:  55,
    Columns: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 52,
        NameEnd: 55,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
    },
  },
  InterleaveIn: &ast.InterleaveIn{
    Comma:     56,
    TableName: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 74,
      NameEnd: 80,
      Name:    "foobar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (foo DESC) STORING (bar), INTERLEAVE IN foobar
